draftSchedules.name: Copy of formula

interactions.name: Set Live View
interactions.description: Sets the planning view mode to live

default.animationKeyframes: @keyframes fadeIn { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(10px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } }
@keyframes slideInFromLeft { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateX(-20px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateX(0); } }

en.code:
const count = collections['06961c10-9632-4582-9f15-bb9ba8e53d61']?.['total'] || 0;
return count + (count === 1 ? ' draft' : ' drafts');

text.en: Fill in the details below to create a new draft. Your changes will be automatically saved.

_ww-text_text.de: Fülle die folgenden Felder aus, um einen neuen Entwurf zu erstellen. Deine Änderungen werden automatisch gespeichert.
_ww-text_text.en: Fill in the details below to create a new draft. Your changes will be automatically saved.

default.animationKeyframes: @keyframes slideInFromRight { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateX(20px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateX(0); } }

placeholder.de: Beschreibung oder Notizen zum Entwurf eingeben

text.en: Choose how you want to proceed with your draft

_ww-text_text.de: Wählen Sie aus, wie Sie mit Ihrem Entwurf fortfahren möchten
_ww-text_text.en: Choose how you want to proceed with your draft

interactions.name: Start New Draft
interactions.description: Closes popup and indicates starting new draft

interactions.name: Load Previous Draft
interactions.description: Closes popup and indicates loading previous draft

id,
course_id,

school_id,
